feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar punctuation style, including the use of commas, quotation marks, and periods.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show similarity in lexical and grammatical features with consistent word choice and grammatical structures.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are comparable in terms of complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share common expressions and tone, emphasizing generalizations and societal issues.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structures, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate to high.
